casebody.data:
BRADLEY
v.
MAXIM HEALTHCARE SER. No. 425P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 30, 2008. Susan J. Vanderweert, Raleigh, for Maxim Healthcare. William G. Goldston, Durham, for Bradley.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of September 2008 by Defendants (Maxim Healthcare & A.I. South Ins. Co.) for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of September 2008."
